attributes.action: Stop any restrictions being put on Freedom of the Press
attributes.additional_details:
The current obsession by  so called celebrities to put in place regulations that will limit the rights of individuals and newspapers to disclose wrongdoings or there indiscretions is a fundamental attack on the rights of the individual.

The rich and the powerful would like to turn the clock back to Victorian times where they can do what they like without it being publicized.

If the use of injunctions is not curtailed what next,the hacked off campaign want a french system where you cannot criticize politicians or the rich and powerful.

This petition is to ensure that a message be sent to all three man parties and the gvernment that freedom of speech ad expression is worth fighting for.
